description: Monitor for the unexpected creation of memory dump files for the LSASS process (e.g., `lsass{*}.dmp`). Analytic 1 - Unexpected creation of LSASS dump files. index=security sourcetype="WinEventLog:Security" EventCode=4663 ObjectName="*\\lsass*.dmp" | where ProcessName IN ("procdump.exe", "rundll32.exe", "taskmgr.exe", "powershell.exe", "wmic.exe", "schtasks.exe", "cmd.exe", "comsvcs.dll")
